Text: Power Plant Outages InformationDear Colleague Are you keeping up to date on plant outage information nuclear or fossil now that the Nuclear Regulatory Commission status report is no longer being published Here is the plant outage information you would have received on Energy Argus in the last two weeks If outage information is important to you please contact more information Date Time Headlines ECAR Plant Watch DPL Energys MW coalfired JM Stuart unit in Ohio now back online a source close to the plant told Argus Wisconsin nuclear plants running at reduced capacity on transmission line repairs MAIN Plant Watch Wisconsin Public Services MW Kewaunee to stay off line for refueling outage until at least Thanksgiving a source close to the plant told Argus The outage began Sept and is expected to last weeks for a steam generator replacement PJM Plant Watch Exelons MW Peach Bottom in hot standby following a main generator trip at EST Oct due to a malfunction of a circuit panel Investigations are ongoing and repairs have yet to begin a source close to the plant told Argus SERC Plant Watch Southern Companys MW Hatch above pct and ramping up Unit tripped off Oct from pct MAIN Plant Watch Wisconsin Electrics MW Point Beach nuclear unit remains at reduced capacity pct due to a transmission wire reduction Unclear when restriction will be lifted UPDATE MAPP Plant Watch Xcel Energys MW Monticello nuclear unit remains off line after an automatic trip Oct caused by a worker bumping into an instrument that automatically trips the plant during a seismic event Details on restart not immediately available however a source close to the plant said that start up is not expected to take long MAPP Plant Watch Xcel Energys MW Monticello nuclear unit shut Tuesday Details on restart not immediately available MAPP Plant Watch Xcel Energys MW coalfired Allen S King plant in Oak Park Heights Minn shut pm local time Tuesday on valve problem Plant seen back up Thursday or Friday sources close to the plant told Argus MAIN Plant Watch Wisconsin Electrics MW Point Beach nuclear unit reduced to pct from pct on Tuesday MAPP Plant Watch Alliant Energys MW Duane Arnold at pct rising after unplanned work Oct and repairs to pump seal ECAR Plant Watch Cinergy MW coalfired Gibson Station unit shut Wednesday sources close to the plant told Argus Reason length of outage at plant near Princeton Ind unclear ECAR Plant Watch DPL Energys MW coalfired JM Stuart unit in Ohio remains shut after booster pump snag late Monday Unit seen back up to full power by EST source close to the plant told Argus Energy Argus Nuclear Plant Fall Refuel Table ECAR Plant Watch Cinergys coalfired Beckjord MW unit MW unit both units shut for maintenance New Richmond Ohios unit shut early October unit more recently source close to the plant told Argus ECAR Plant Watch DPL Energy MW coalfired JM Stuart unit in Ohio shut late Monday on booster pump snag may be back by early Wednesday MW unit shut Oct for two weeks of work source close to the plant told Argus MAIN Plant Watch Exelon Nuclears MW Braidwood at pct performing maintenance on main generator ECAR Plant Watch Cinergy coalfired MW Miami Fort units shut for maintenance Unit shut since Sept for twomonth outage unit shut earlier sources close to the Hamilton Ohio plant told Argus MAPP Plant Watch Alliant Energys MW Duane Arnold at pct rising after unplanned work Oct and repairs to pump seal MAIN Plant Watch Wisconsin Electrics MW Point Beach nuclear unit reduced to pct SERC Plant Watch TVAs Cumberland coalfired MW unit remains shut for day maintenance outage that began midSeptember About days of work remains source close to the plant told Argus SPP Plant Watch Entergys MW River Bend at pct exited refueling outage Oct MAPP Plant Watch Alliant Energys MW Duane Arnold is in start up exiting maintenance outage that shut the plant down Oct MAIN Plant Watch Exelon Nuclears MW Braidwood at pct performing maintenance on main generator MAIN Plant Watch Exelons MW Dresden entered refueling outage Oct SERC Plant Watch Dukes MW Catawba in start up exiting a refueling outage that began Sept SERC Plant Watch Southern Companys MW Hatch is expected to begin ramp up Tuesday night exiting a refueling outage that began Sept MAIN Plant Watch Wisconsin Electrics MW Point Beach returned to pct after reducing power due to transmission problems in the area MAIN Plant Watch Wisconsin Electrics MW Point Beach reduced to pct Plant was asked to reduce power due to transmission problems in the area helping to prevent lines from overloading MAPP Plant Watch Alliant Energys MW Duane Arnold shut after am due to an electrical problem source close to the plant told Argus Plant will remain shut for about a week to perform work on a recirculation pump that had been planned for early November MAIN Plant Watch Commonwealth Edisons MW Braidwood at pct performing maintenance on main generator MAIN Plant Watch Commonwealth here for testing until Friday Oct a source close to the plant told Argus WSCC Plant Watch Arizona Public Service Companys MW Palo Verde at pct defueled WSCC Plant Watch Southern California Edisons MW control element assemblies The unit which was shut down Oct should be back by early November said the company SERC Plant Watch Virginia Powers MW Surry entered refueling outage over weekend a source Refuel outage began Sept All other FPL nuclear units Turkey Point and St Lucie are at pct FRCC Plant Watch Florida Powers MW Crystal River at pct remains shut for refueling outage that began Oct source close to the plant told Argus SPP Plant Watch Entergys MW River Bend at pct holding here for testing The plant is expected to return to full power sometime tomorrow a source close to the plant
